description.value:
Woodworking tools are used to create everything from furniture and dwellings to the more delicate craftsmanship of bows and crossbows. Skilled woodworkers combine precision and strength to shape natural materials into functional and elegant forms.

  • Skill Advantage: A woodworker has &reference[advantage] on checks involving woodworking, including but not limited to some &reference[Engineering] and &reference[Nature] checks.

  • Open Container or Door: With 1 minute and an &reference[Engineering] skill check, a woodworker can attempt to open a locked or sealed container or door that would normally require @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.LMnHshpVe3ciVIwF]{Thieves' Tools}, using the same DC as lockpicking. This breaks the container or door.

  • Craft: A woodworker can craft one of the following over a long rest:

    • Armor: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.OE836KUoJiAsG0IA]{Small Shield} and @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.AENiTUeluTRiFzRz]{Large Shield}.

    • Melee Weapons: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.Xq5GOTmI51WGTB2i]{Club}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.yWjRA9RARTDSbAfU]{Greatclub}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.qpOD3sz47K9lnNgt]{Quarterstaff}.

    • Ranged Weapons: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.1eqSvbUzm4rVN0BW]{Blowgun}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.wPcrbw6GTNb9ZYvp]{Light Crossbow}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.uHNpC0W5EdHCOnP6]{Shortbow}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.95GGJe2TrPOBeRIU]{Hand Crossbow}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.pW1brh2c1mr4LyCq]{Heavy Crossbow}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.u9OIgbETWimkeEx5]{Longbow}.*

    • Misc: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.yp93GRZZClJSh0uk]{Barrel}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.zRiVRxwgoiQVRpzI]{Chest}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.Cqrhj2LacgGHv1YG]{Ladder}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.p7cqtTpdsV5aqhli]{Poles} (x4), @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.QhOWqL63riBcXphX]{Portable Ram}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.pULRx2Zi5CWcbI59]{Torches} (x10).

    • Limitations: A woodworker cannot create &reference[adamantine], &reference[cold iron], or &reference[silver] items.

* Bows come with Arrows (x20) and crossbows come with Bolts (x20) as needed at no extra cost.
